模块 com.example.demo

类 Projectile

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.Actor.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.Actor.ActiveActorDestructible
com.example.demo.Actor.Projectile
所有已实现的接口:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
直接已知子类:
BossProjectile, EnemyProjectile, UserProjectile
public abstract class Projectile extends ActiveActorDestructible
The Projectile class represents a projectile in the game. It extends ActiveActorDestructible and includes the behavior of taking damage and updating the position of the projectile. Subclasses must implement the updatePosition() method to define how the projectile moves.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Projectile

      public Projectile(String imageName, double imageWidth, int imageHeight, double initialXPos, double initialYPos)
      Constructs a new Projectile object with the specified image, position, and size.
      参数:
      imageName - The name of the image file used to represent the projectile.
      imageWidth - The width of the projectile image.
      imageHeight - The height of the projectile image.
      initialXPos - The initial X position of the projectile.
      initialYPos - The initial Y position of the projectile.

  • 方法详细资料

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage()
      Handles the behavior of the projectile when it takes damage. When a projectile takes damage, it is destroyed.
      指定者:
      takeDamage 在接口中 Destructible
      指定者:
      takeDamage 在类中 ActiveActorDestructible

    • updatePosition

      public abstract void updatePosition()
      Updates the position of the projectile. Subclasses must implement this method to define how the projectile's position is updated.
      指定者:
      updatePosition 在类中 ActiveActorDestructible
